React: React.js is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
.Net: .NET is a free, cross-platform, open-source developer platform for building many different types of applications.
Flutter: Flutter is a UI toolkit from Google for building natively compiled applications for mobile.
Spring Boot: Spring Boot is a Java framework for production-ready applications.
Django: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
JavaScript: JavaScript is a lightweight, interpreted, and high-level programming language that is widely used for web applications.
Python: Python is an interpreted, high-level, often used for web development.
Android: Android is an open-source operating system primarily used for mobile devices, developed by Google.
